title: Fontpartners
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023061112/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023061112/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Fontpartners**

Type design studio created in 2006 by Danish designers [Morten Olsen](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023061112/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Morten%20Olsen) and [Ole Søndergaard](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023061112/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ole%20S%C3%B8ndergaard). The site showcases the partners' FontFonts as well as new fonts available exclusively through Fontpartners.

[http://www.fontpartners.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023061112/http:/www.fontpartners.com/ "http://www.fontpartners.com")
author: Stephen Coles
